items.sentence: If Tom couldn\'t do it, probably nobody else will be able to either.
Tom couldn\'t find a job he liked in Boston, so he moved to Chicago.
The store was so crowded that Tom and Mary lost sight of each other.
Tom told Mary that he had finished the work she had asked him to do.
Tom took a small envelope from his shirt pocket and gave it to Mary.
Tom tried to make amends by giving back all the money he had stolen.
Tom tried to make sure that every employee was treated with respect.
I had to wait for Tom\'s reply for a long time, but it was worth it.
At first, Tom seemed angry, but then I realized he was just worried.
Being aware of what and how much we eat is essential to good health.
